Text:
Let us pray.
Lord our God, give us restful and restoring sleep tonight. [t] Give Your children peace after the exertion of our daily work. [*] Out of Your abundant faithfulness, You always revive us. With joy, we will serve You in spirit, soul, and body, through Jesus Christ, our Lord.
Amen.
Changes: 2024-01-19 - Paul Prins: Reworked to be more stylistically in line with my writing.
2023-08-31 - Paul Prins: Fix the order of the words
